trans-unit.source: Provides common methods and properties for composite activity designers that contain structured layouts.
trans-unit.target: 为包含结构化布局的复合活动设计器提供通用方法和属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> is the base class for all designers that contain child designers and the child designers are connected to each other using lines rendered on the design surface, called connectors.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> 是所有包含子设计器的设计器的基类，这些子设计器使用设计图面上呈现的称为连接器的线相互连接。

trans-unit.source: The class is provided so that activity designer developers can provide a number of activity designer layout types, rather than being tied to the layout provided in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: 提供此类可使活动设计器开发人员能够提供若干活动设计器布局类型，而不限于 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> 类中提供的布局。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中实现时，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" /> that contains information about the current designer view displayed by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" />，其中包含有关由 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 显示的当前设计器视图的信息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" /> that contains information about the current view displayed by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" />，其中包含有关由 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 显示的当前视图的信息。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.ActiveView%2A> contains the view ID and any text, images, activity designers, and user data associated with the view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.ActiveView%2A> 包含视图 ID 和文本、图像、活动设计器和与视图关联的用户数据。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> that contains the screen location at which to attempt to insert the activities.
trans-unit.target: 包含试图插入活动的屏幕位置的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> read-only collection that contains the activities to add.
trans-unit.target: 包含要添加的活动的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 只读集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified activities can be added to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> at the specified location on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否可以将指定的活动添加到工作流设计图面上指定位置的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified activities can be inserted at the specified location on the workflow design surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以将指定活动插入工作流设计图面的指定位置，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to lock a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> by not allowing the insertion of child activities.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何通过不允许插入子活动来锁定 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> read-only collection that contains the activities to remove.
trans-unit.target: 包含要移除的活动的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 只读集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified activities can be removed from the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否可以从 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 中移除指定活动。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified activities can be removed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以移除指定活动，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.CanRemoveActivities%2A> method to allow the moving of child activities within the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何重写 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.CanRemoveActivities%2A> 方法，以便允许在 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> 内移动子活动。

trans-unit.source: Gets a generic read-only collection that contains all activity designers that are children of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个泛型只读集合，其中包含作为 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 的子级的所有活动设计器。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> read-only collection that contains the child designers.
trans-unit.target: 包含子设计器的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> 只读集合。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the addition of a new branch using a designer based off of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> 类的基于设计器的中断来添加新的分支。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.CanInsertActivities%2A> returns true, a new branch is created using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.CanInsertActivities%2A> 返回 true，则使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A> 方法创建一个新分支。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo> object is created as a parameter to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo> 对象作为 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A> 方法的参数。

trans-unit.source: When this is finished, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.EnsureVisibleContainedDesigner%2A> method is used to ensure that the newly added branch is displayed in the workflow designer by accessing a single object in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 创建完成后，使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.EnsureVisibleContainedDesigner%2A> 方法确保可以通过访问 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> 集合中的单个对象在工作流设计器中显示新添加的分支。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the current drop target in the array of drop targets returned by <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.GetDropTargets(System.Drawing.Point)" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由 <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.GetDropTargets(System.Drawing.Point)" /> 返回的放置目标数组中当前放置目标的索引。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the index of the current drop target for the designer.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示设计器的当前放置目标的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> on which to draw the connectors.
trans-unit.target: 要在其上绘制连接器的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> to draw the connectors.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制连接器的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> array that contains the endpoints for each of the connectors to draw.
trans-unit.target: 包含要绘制的每个连接器的端点的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 数组。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor" /> that determines the graphic to draw at connector start points.
trans-unit.target: 确定要在连接器的起始点绘制的图形的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor" /> that determines the graphic to draw at connector end points.
trans-unit.target: 确定要在连接器的终点绘制的图形的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws all of the connectors to display on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 绘制要在 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 上显示的所有连接器。

trans-unit.source: Connectors are links between separate designers on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 连接器是工作流设计图面上独立的设计器之间的链接。

trans-unit.source: These links appear as lines on the design surface and each line end connects to a visible point on the designers it connects.
trans-unit.target: 这些链接在设计图面上显示为线，每条线的端点连接到其所连接的设计器上的可见点。

trans-unit.source: These points are called connection points.
trans-unit.target: 这些点称为连接点。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> for which to ensure visibility on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 确保其在工作流设计图面上可见的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the specified activity designer is visible on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 确保指定的活动设计器在工作流设计图面上可见。

trans-unit.source: Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 的导航顺序中的第一个可选择对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the first selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，该对象是设计器导航顺序中的第一个可选择对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.AssociatedDesigner%2A> property that is exposed through <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.ActiveView%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> 返回与通过 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> 公开的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.AssociatedDesigner%2A> 属性关联的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.ActiveView%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to query the design surface with.
trans-unit.target: 用于查询设计图面的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of valid drop locations on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> surface.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 图面上的有效放置位置的数组。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> array that represents the valid drop locations on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> surface.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 数组，表示 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 图面上的有效放置位置。

trans-unit.source: The DesignerEdges along which to search for connection points.
trans-unit.target: 要沿其搜索连接点的 DesignerEdge。

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of points that represent the inner connection points for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个表示 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 的内部连接点的各个点的只读集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> generic read-only collection that contains the inner connection points for the designer.
trans-unit.target: 包含设计器的内部连接点的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 泛型只读集合。

trans-unit.source: Connectors are links between separate designers on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 连接器是工作流设计图面上独立的设计器之间的链接。

trans-unit.source: These links appear as lines on the design surface and each line end connects to a visible point on each designer it connects.
trans-unit.target: 这些链接在设计图面上显示为线，每条线的端点连接到其所连接的设计器上的可见点。

trans-unit.source: These points are called connection points.
trans-unit.target: 这些点称为连接点。

trans-unit.source: Designer classes that inherit from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> class can contain other designers, and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.GetInnerConnections%2A> returns a read-only collection of all the connection points for the designers associated with `edges` that are contained by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: 继承于 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> 类的设计器类可以包含其他设计器，而 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.GetInnerConnections%2A> 返回由 `edges` 包含的与 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> 关联的设计器的所有连接点的只读集合。

trans-unit.source: The current object in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: 导航顺序中的当前对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection" /> that determines the navigation order of the designer.
trans-unit.target: 确定设计器的导航顺序的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order for the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 的导航顺序中位于指定对象后面的第一个可选择对象。

trans-unit.source: The first selectable <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that follows the <paramref name="obj" /> parameter in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: 导航顺序中位于 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 参数后面的第一个可选择 <paramref name="obj" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> with which to initialize the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 时所使用的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the designer by using the specified activity.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定活动初始化设计器。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.Initialize%2A> ensures that the active view loaded into the workflow design surface is a valid view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.Initialize%2A> 确保加载到工作流设计图面中的活动视图是有效视图。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> that specifies the location to add the activities.
trans-unit.target: 指定活动添加位置的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> read-only collection that contains the activities to add to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的只读集合，其中包含要添加到 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 的活动。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified activities to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> at the specified location on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 将指定活动添加到工作流设计图面上指定位置处的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 的导航顺序中的最后一个可选择对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，该对象是设计器导航顺序中的最后一个可选择对象。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> is the active activity designer, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> returns `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> 为有效的活动设计器，则 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> 返回 `null`（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。

trans-unit.source: If a child activity designer is the active designer, it returns the last selectable object associated with the active child designer.
trans-unit.target: 如果子活动设计器是有效的设计器，则它返回与有效的子设计器关联的最后一个可选择对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.BinaryReader" /> used to restore the designer view state.
trans-unit.target: 用于还原设计器视图状态的 <see cref="T:System.IO.BinaryReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Loads the view state of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> from a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: 从二进制流加载 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> 包含空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum size settings for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 的最小大小设置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the smallest possible size for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 的可能的最小大小。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> that contains the location on the workflow design surface to move the activities.
trans-unit.target: 包含工作流设计图面上要移动活动的位置的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> read-only collection to move.
trans-unit.target: 要移动的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 只读集合。

trans-unit.source: Moves the specified activities from one designer displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> to another.
trans-unit.target: 将指定活动从 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 中显示的一个设计器移动到另一个设计器中。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityChangedEventArgs" /> that contains information about the changed activity.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关已更改活动的信息的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityChangedEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer when the activity associated with it changes.
trans-unit.target: 当与设计器关联的活动发生更改时向设计器发出通知。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" /> that contains information about the activities that changed.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关已更改活动的信息的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> when more than one of the activities it contains has changed.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 包含的多个活动发生更改时向其发出通知。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" /> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: 定义操作事件参数的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> when a drag-drop operation is completed with the bounds of its design surface.
trans-unit.target: 对设计图面的边界完成拖放操作时向 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 发出通知。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 包含空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" /> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: 定义操作事件参数的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor enters the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: 正在执行拖放操作并且用户的鼠标光标进入设计器的边界时，向 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 发出通知。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 包含空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor leaves the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: 正在执行拖放操作并且用户的鼠标光标离开设计器的边界时，向 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 发出通知。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" /> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: 定义操作事件参数的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor is inside the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: 当执行拖放操作并且用户的鼠标光标位于设计器边界内时，向 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 发出通知。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 包含空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: 包含布局参数的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 上执行位置视觉提示和子设计器的布局任务。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 包含空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: 包含布局参数的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> when the size of the visual cues on the designers displayed by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> have changed.
trans-unit.target: 当由 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 显示的设计器上的视觉提示大小发生更改时，向 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 发出通知。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the new size of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 表示工作流设计图面上 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> 的新大小的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that represents the location on the workflow design surface for which to show <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 表示工作流设计图面上显示 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 对象的位置的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" />。

trans-unit.source: Displays the designer verbs associated with a smart tag at a specified location on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 显示与工作流设计图面上指定位置处的智能标记关联的设计器谓词。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" /> that is to be set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" />。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> when the current designer view changes.
trans-unit.target: 在当前设计器视图发生更改时，向 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 发出通知。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.BinaryWriter" /> to which the current designer view state is stored.
trans-unit.target: 要将当前设计器视图状态存储到的 <see cref="T:System.IO.BinaryWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Stores the current view state of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> to a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 的当前视图状态存储到二进制流中。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> displays smart tags.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 是否显示智能标记。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the designer displays smart tags; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果设计器显示智能标记，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of designer actions that are associated with the smart tags on the designer.
trans-unit.target: 获取与设计器上的智能标记关联的设计器操作的只读集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" /> read-only collection that contains all the actions associated with the smart tags on the designer.
trans-unit.target: 包含与设计器上智能标记关联的所有操作的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" /> 只读集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection is returned only if the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> hosts multiple views.
trans-unit.target: 只有 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> 承载多个视图时才返回该集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.Views%2A> property to determine how many views the current designer hosts.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.Views%2A> 属性可确定当前设计器承载多少个视图。

trans-unit.source: Get a read-only collection of designer views that the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> hosts.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 承载的设计器视图的只读集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" /> read-only collection that contains the views hosted by the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含由当前 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" /> 承载的视图的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> 只读集合。
